ratings.comment: Professor was fine, was a visiting scholar and I had difficulty understanding them with their accent. Course was very fairly graded and exams were easier than other ochem sections. Other reviews are biased most likely, her average grade that semester was .5 higher than the other professors teaching the same course. More than fair
Excellent professor who really gave me a passion for organic chem

Her lectures were always very fast-paced and it was often hard trying to follow along. When talking about mechanisms, she would quickly walk through them without presenting sufficient examples. Lectures felt like we were just listening to a narration of the textbook.

Honestly, one of the worst professors Ive ever had. Terrible at teaching, and is actually unfair to her students compared to other Chem343 professors. I would never have taken this class if I had known she was going to be this poor.
